name: Bean Cash
public_notice: [17 Aug 2019] Rebranded from BEAN to BITB - https://twitter.com/BeanCash_BEAN/status/1162652207067664384

description.en: Bean Cash has a maximum coin supply of 50 billion virtual beans, approximately 2380 times more than Bitcoin's supply. It will take 96 years before all of Bitbean's supply is fully available. It is the first cryptocurrency to implement a 20MB block size limit. Bitbean has a confirmation time of 1 minute.

status_updates.description:
Bean Core is working hard to make certain there are plenty of trading opportunities for the Bean Cash community. The following is a list of exchanges(trading pairs) currently available for trading:
localbitcoincash.org,
coinexchange.io(BTC, DOGE, ETH),
stakecube.net(BTC),
bitonbay.com(BTC),
btcpop.co(BTC),
satowallet.com(SATOS),
altmarkets.io(BTC, DOGE),
unnamed.exchange(BTC,LTC,DOGE),
atomiic.io(any to any swaps via smart contract)

An updated Android App for Bean  Cash is available as a Beta release (v1.3b).  If you would like to test the App on your Android device, you may download it here::  http://www.beancash.org/downloads/android_light_13b.apk
